attributes.action: Bring back capital punishment for child molesters and murderers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Child molesters and murderers should not be given the chance to regain their freedom. Peoples children should be safe in our society. Rid society of these vile and evil monsters.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
